_comment: Optimized config for LERF Figurines dataset
_densify_comment: Longer densification (15k) - small scene benefits from more refinement
_densify_grad_comment: Default threshold - good for small scenes
_reg3d_interval_comment: More frequent regularization - small scene can afford it
_reg3d_lambda_comment: Strong regularization - helps with small object boundaries
_reg3d_max_comment: All points (50k) - small enough to process everything
_opacity_reset_comment: Default - frequent resets help clean up small scenes
